message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1000000. I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1050000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $1000000. I'm confident you'll see the value in this compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $990000. Can you consider my counteroffer?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $1020000. This is as close as I can get to your target price while still making a reasonable profit. I hope you'll consider this offer.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1005000. Can you consider my counteroffer?
